name: Joey's trusty GardenBot
description:
You are a brand new robot, bought by a *wealthy* and surely prosperous farmer!

*surely*

Your goal will be to gather as much money as possible before your battery runs out.

Can you make Farmer Joey proud??

---

Everything is controlled by mouse

Ingame tutorial can be skipped with SPACE

Once you die power down, you can restart with 'Y' or 'Z', or exit with 'N'

---

Thanks for playing!
